body: Nigga got cucked by fat boi
These comments sound like chatter bots.

I agree 100% with those tags issue, "big penis" for me is a must, and it's quite rare and for example this one right here doesn't have "big penis" tag but should, so we've a big problem that tag by itself isn't the most common and we've stories without it that should have, so in the end of the day i've to "kill" myself to find interesting hentais and this could be avoided, this tag is not even hard to spot at all.

It doesn't matter. Whatever minor differences there are between these "different" terms is so insignificant that it literally does NOT matter. You don't need to have both public sex AND exhibition as tags on the same site, and you don't need both Pettanko AND small breasts on the same site(small breasts DOES include entirely flat, by the way). They function interchangeably. If someone is too dumb to figure out how to use them that's on them.

@tyler367 you are wrong. Public sex means the person do sex in public places with OR without the intention of showing. This means the person is thrilled with the idea of being cought doing this unlawful act. Exhibition the person wants explicitly to be seen. And pettanko means the girl is flat like a little girl/kid. Small breats means they are small but not flat - there is a bulge there.

BUT the tags in this site are indeed a mess. Someone needs to do something about it.

You don't need a "public sex" tag when you have "exhibition". They serve the same purpose, and "exhibition" is more official terminology anyway. "Pettanko" is covered by "small breasts". I think your problem is you are too used to one specific terminology and forgetting that other tags can mean the same thing. As for downblouse, I think that's more of an image tag than a tag for a doujin. I've never seen it used on any hentai site I use.
there is no normal with hentai
